title: can't patch after the arcade event
body:
today a new patch was offerd to me  so i tried to download  it but after the window appears and says downloading it satys in 0Mb/Mb 
i cant do anything i tried to rebot my computer but it doesnt work 
help me pls 
thanks in advance !!

replies.body: Let's try getting that patch installed in more of a manual way by using our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) to run a **force repatch**. Let me know if that helps!
